channel.title: [Beginners]SQL Injection Ninja
channel.description:
Hi guys... been a while since I've last posted. Welp, here we go. What I have today is a pretty cool practice website to practice SQLi's on (SQL Injections). The site in question is:
http://leettime.net/sqlninja.com/
If you don't know what a SQLi is, [OWASP](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/SQL_Injection) has a pretty decent explanation and a couple of examples, but not for the faint of heart. There's other great tutorials that I've read but didn't save... oops.
Hope this helps since sharing is caring... although, if anyone has questions, please, please, check me out on IRC at irc.0x00sec.org:6697+ and my alias(es) is coffee/f0rg/whatever-hell-I-feel-like-today.
With that being siad, ~Cheers!
P.S. Didn't know where to put this.
--Techno_Forg--

item.title: [Beginners]SQL Injection Ninja
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Beginners]SQL Injection Ninja
item.dc:creator: lacunastar
item.description:
Hey thanks, I’ve been meaning to practice SQLi. I’ll dig through my links for tutorials and post them here when I find them, if that’s acceptable.

These links were of use to me, hopefully to you all too:
https://www.w3schools.com/sql/sql_injection.asp
https://www.incapsula.com/web-application-security/sql-injection.html
https://www.netsparker.com/blog/web-security/sql-injection-cheat-sheet/

Read full topic
